modShortDescription: This mod adds a recurve bow to 7 Days to Die. There is a schematic that can be looted to learn the recipe to create the bow.
modDescription:
This mod adds a recurve bow to 7 Days to Die.

There is a schematic that can be looted to learn the recipe to create the bow. It has also been added to the loot table along side the compound bow.

This is Dorbsonâ€™s first attempt at adding a [weapon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) to the game.

Credit Tediuminteractive for the 3d model.

**[Download](https://github.com/dorbson/Recurve-Bow/archive/master.zip)**

**Credits:** Dorbson, Tediuminteractive
